title: Pset_DistributionPortTypeDuct
description: Duct port occurrence attributes attached to an instance of IfcDistributionPort.

ConnectionType.title: ConnectionType
ConnectionType.description:
The end-style treatment of the duct port:

BEADEDSLEEVE: Beaded Sleeve. 
COMPRESSION: Compression. 
CRIMP: Crimp. 
DRAWBAND: Drawband. 
DRIVESLIP: Drive slip. 
FLANGED: Flanged. 
OUTSIDESLEEVE: Outside Sleeve. 
SLIPON: Slipon. 
SOLDERED: Soldered. 
SSLIP: S-Slip. 
STANDINGSEAM: Standing seam. 
SWEDGE: Swedge. 
WELDED: Welded. 
OTHER: Another type of end-style has been applied.
NONE: No end-style has been applied.

ConnectionSubType.title: ConnectionSubType
ConnectionSubType.description: The physical port connection subtype that further qualifies the ConnectionType.

NominalWidth.title: NominalWidth
NominalWidth.description: The nominal width or diameter of the duct connection.

NominalHeight.title: NominalHeight
NominalHeight.description: The nominal height of the duct connection. Only provided for rectangular shaped ducts.

NominalThickness.title: NominalThickness
NominalThickness.description: The nominal wall thickness of the duct at the connection point.

DryBulbTemperature.title: DryBulbTemperature
DryBulbTemperature.description: Dry bulb temperature of the air.

WetBulbTemperature.title: WetBulbTemperature
WetBulbTemperature.description: Wet bulb temperature of the air.

VolumetricFlowRate.title: VolumetricFlowRate
VolumetricFlowRate.description: The volumetric flow rate of the fluid.
